code: import axios from'axios';const DEFAULT_API_URL='https://ranvijay.capricorn.online/api';const configuredApiUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||DEFAULT_API_URL;const api=axios.create({baseURL:configuredApiUrl.replace(/\/+$/,'')});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export default api;
